label: El-Hawagry, Magdi S. A.  2016. Review of the genus Defilippia Lioy (Bombyliidae, Diptera) from Egypt, with description of a new species, new combinations, and a neotype designation for  D. pharaonis (Paramonov, 1928). Zootaxa 4170(1): 149–158.

title: Review of the genus Defilippia Lioy (Bombyliidae, Diptera) from Egypt, with description of a new species, new combinations, and a neotype designation for D. pharaonis (Paramonov, 1928)
